metadata.title: CVE-2020-13950 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Apache HTTP Server versions 2.4.41 to 2.4.46 mod_proxy_http can be made tocrash (NULL pointer dereference) with specially crafted requests using bothContent-Length and Transfer-Encoding headers, leading to a Denial ofService

criterions.comment: apache2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
